Australian Mathematical Society

The society is (rightfully) mathematics oriented but occasionally
features statistics. Contrary to common belief, statistics is
not a subset of mathematics, although some areas of statistics
have a large intersection with the field.
For women, Women in
Mathematics Special Interest Group (WIMSIG) may be of interest. I
find their
newsletter to be excellent.
